onboarding_survey.messages.1.text:
Please select your language:

[Other language: please select your language]

üß° You are a great parent. Thank you for joining us. 

‚úÖ Participating in ParentText is optional.
‚úÖ We won‚Äôt ever ask for your name. Anything you share is safe, private, and anonymous.
‚úÖYour anonymous information may also be shared with others working to help families like yours build strength and hope in tough times. All your information will be private and can‚Äôt be linked back to you.
‚ùåYou can stop when you want. Just type {STOP}
‚úÖ To read our privacy policy, visit {consent}. If you are over 16 and consent to our privacy policy, select YES. Type "EXIT" if you do not want to participate.
Thank you! To complete this programme, you won‚Äôt be alone. You‚Äôll have a parenting guide by your side. There are two supportive parenting experts you can choose from:
Who would you like to be your guide?
‚ùîBefore we get started, we have a few questions to make this journey personalised:
Are you a WOMAN or MAN?
How many children do you take care of?
These tips are designed for those who look after children. Would you still like to receive the tips so you can share the advice with friends and family?
onboarding_survey.choices.2.text: I do not want the tips
onboarding_survey.stop.conditions.1.message: Thank you for your time. If you decide you want these tips later, type {joining_trigger}.

onboarding_survey.messages.1.text:
This is a very difficult time for you and your family. We are glad you are here. You may need more support than just these tips, but we hope these tips can help even just a little. 

What would you like to do?
onboarding_survey.choices.2.text: I do not want the tips
onboarding_survey.stop.conditions.1.message: That's okay. If you decide you want these tips later, type {joining_trigger}.

onboarding_survey.messages.1.text: What is your current living situation?
onboarding_survey.choices.1.text: Living in a camp or shelter
onboarding_survey.choices.2.text: Living in a house or apartment

onboarding_survey.messages.1.text: üì≤ How would you prefer to receive content ‚Äî with audio guides, with video guides, or just text?

Thanks for answering our questions. We're ready to get started. üíö
To start, you can watch this video to learn about ParentText.

joining_messages.msg: Thanks for reaching out ü§ç It really shows how much you care about your children. Right now, the programme is full, but we‚Äôve added you to the waiting list. As soon as a spot opens up, we‚Äôll let you know.
